page.title: 01WEETING
page.content: The block is just in Norfolk and con- sists of the village of Weeting amidst mixed farmland and evolved from a feu- dal system based at Weeting Hall.Since its disappearance with its important families, the growth has been mostly in bungalows to the north and south of the village green and many of them are inhabited by retired people from out- side E.Anglia and Americans stationed at nearby Airbases. This tends to lead to a frequent turnover in the popula- tion but there are still many natives who can recall Weeting back to the turn of the century.Sometimes the Americans are accused of neglecting their properties to the detriment of the village.There is mains water,elec- tricity and sewerage but no gas.
